resources.string: Looking at the big wide world of stocks, it\'s easy to get confused and that\'s okay. So what are stocks? Well, a stock is a share of a company held by an individual or group. Depending on the performance of Apple or the climate of the stock market, the price of the stocks that Joey bought could either rise or fall. Now that you know what stocks are, you should know the types of stocks: Preferred and Common stocks. Here is a diagram to show the main differences between the two stocks.

Now you can say you have taken your first official steps into the stock market. If you believe that your favourite company is going to do well, you should buy their stocks and see the prices go up along with your investment!
Remember to never stop learning and to know that everyone takes losses sometimes but it\'s all part of the learning experience. Be sure to check out more tips and tricks on Investor\'s Edge. Happy trading!
